### Layout

Currently, `ggtree` supports several layout, including `phylogram` (by default), `cladogram`, `dendrogram`, `fan`, `radial` and `unrooted`.

```{r fig.width=12, fig.height=24}
tr <- rtree(30)
grid.arrange(ggtree(tr) + ggtitle("phylogram layout"),
	     ggtree(tr) + scale_x_reverse() + ggtitle("phylogram layout") ,
	     ggtree(tr, layout="cladogram") + ggtitle("cladogram layout"),
	     ggtree(tr, layout="cladogram") + coord_flip() + ggtitle("cladogram layout"),
	     ggtree(tr, layout="dendrogram") + ggtitle("dendrogram layout"),
	     ggtree(tr, layout="fan") + ggtitle("fan layout"),
	     ggtree(tr, layout="radial") + ggtitle("radial layout"),
	     ggtree(tr, layout="unrooted") + ggtitle("unrooted layout"),
	     ncol=2)
```
